item.title: My own version of summoning
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

Right now I am trying to make my own version of summoning so I want to use some crystals. So you would click the crystal and it would summon an npc to follow you and then attack when I attack.

I know it will involve cases but don’t exactly know how to do it

For example I want to use the crystal’s from id’s 6640-6645

case 6640: // crystal to summon green dragon if (newNPC >= 0) { server.npcHandler.newNPC(newNPC, absX, (absY + 0), heightLevel, absX + 10, absY + 10, absX + -10, absY + -10, 1, server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(newNPC), false); sendMessage("You summon a green dragon!"); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } break;

Read full topic
